title: Middlekauff - 3 & Out - Pats' huge Super Bowl edge; Chiefs' DC change; Future of NFL analytics; Senior Bowl; Derek Carr fight club
itunes:title: Middlekauff - 3 & Out - Pats' huge Super Bowl edge; Chiefs' DC change; Future of NFL analytics; Senior Bowl; Derek Carr fight club
description:
Subscribe here to the 3 and Out with John Middlekauff Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/3-and-out-with-john-middlekauff/id1352730623?mt=2. In this episode, Middlekauff explains why the Patriots' Super Bowl experience is a huge advantage, Andy Reid replacing defensive coordinator Bob Sutton with Steve Spagnuolo, the future of NFL analytics in player evaluation, why the Senior Bowl matters, Derek Carr's beef with Stephen A. Smith, and answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag..

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
